channel.title: Server whont connect
channel.description: Ohkay i have everything done, i have my no-ip open, and everythings good, i run my source, its good, then i run my server and in the server command promt box, it says connection from 127.0.0.1....and it says it's offline, so will someone teamview with me or i.m me so i can figure this ccrap out....i had it running fine last night but today its being worthless. thanks.
